name: War Machine
text: Locked and Loaded - Response: After you change to this form, place 5 ammo counters on War Machine.

name: James Rhodes
text: Action: Choose a War Machine card in your discard pile and shuffle it into your deck. Forced Response: After you change to this form, discard each ammo counter from your identity.

flavor: "What did you do to my suit, Rhodey?"
name: Iron Man
text: Response: After Iron Man enters play, search your deck and discard pile for a [[tech]] upgrade and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: Munitions Bunker
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Munitions Bunker → Place 2 ammo counters here. Hero Action: Exhaust Munitions Bunker → move each ammo counter here to War Machine.

name: Upgraded Chassis
text: War Machine gains the [[aerial]] trait. Hero Response: After you change to hero form, exhaust Upgraded Chassis → give War Machine a tough status card.

flavor: "Time to see what these babies can do." —James Rhodes
name: Gauntlet Gun
text: Resource: Exhaust Gauntlet Gun → generate a [wild] resource for a War Machine event and place 1 ammo counter on War Machine.

name: Missile Launcher
text: Hero Action (attack): Exhaust Missile Launcher and remove 1 ammo counter from War Machine → deal 2 damage to an enemy. This attack gains ranged.

name: Shoulder Cannon
text: Hero Action (attack): Exhaust Shoulder Cannon → deal 1 damage to an enemy. You may remove 1 ammo from War Machine to ready shoulder cannon.

name: Repulsor Beam
text: Hero Action (attack): Remove 1 ammo counter from War Machine → deal 4 damage to an enemy.

flavor: "This is the part where you surrender!" —James Rhodes
name: Targeted Strike
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 1 ammo counter from War Machine → remove 3 threat from a scheme.

flavor: "I say we lift off and strafe the site from the air. It's the only way to be sure." —James Rhodes
name: Scorched Earth
text: Hero Action: Remove 3 ammo counters from War Machine → deal 3 damage to each enemy in play.

flavor: "Hey, Tony! Let me see your Mark V do this!" —James Rhodes
name: Full Auto
text: Hero Action (attack): Remove 4 ammo counters from War Machine and choose an enemy → deal 8 damage to that enemy. This attack gains overkill.

name: Black Panther
text: You may play the event attached to Black Panther as if it were in your hand. Response: After Black Panther enters play, choose a leadership (blue) event in your discard pile and attach it to him facedown.

name: Captain Marvel
text: Response: After Captain Marvel enters play, discard the top 4 cards of your deck. If you discard a printed [energy] resource, deal 3 damage to an enemy. If you discard more than one printed [energy] resource, also stun that enemy.

name: Command Team
text: Uses (3 command counters). Action: Exhaust Command Team and remove 1 command counter from it → ready an ally.

name: Sneak Attack
text: Action: Choose an ally in your hand that shares a [[trait]] with your identity → put that ally into play. If that ally is still in play at the end of the phase, discard it.

flavor: "There are days, and boy, is this ever one of those days!" —Spider-Man
name: Save the Day
text: Hero Action: Discard an ally your control → remove threat from a scheme equal to that ally's printed cost.

flavor: "Spider-Man's banter can get on your nerves, but I tell you what - that kid never quits." —Captain America
name: Go Down Swinging
text: Hero Action: Discard an ally your control → deal damage to an enemy equal to that ally's printed cost.

name: Two Against the World
text: Team-Up (Iron Man and War Machine). Max 1 per deck. Hero Action: Search your deck for a [[tech]] upgrade and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. Ready Iron Man and War Machine.

name: As One!
text: Alliance. Hero Action (attack): Exhaust an [[avenger]] character and a [[guardian]] character → deal X damage to enemy, where X is the combined ATK of those characters. This ATK gains overkill.

name: Vigilante Training
text: Max 2 per deck. Uses (2 training counters). Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust this card and remove 1 training counter from it → choose a justice (yellow) event in your discard pile and shuffle it into your deck.

name: Stand Together
text: Alliance. Hero Interrupt: When a friendly character would take any amount of damage from an attack, exhaust an [[avenger]] character and a [[guardian]] character → prevent all of that damage. Deal that much damage to the attacking enemy.

name: Sidearm
text:
Attach to an ally. Max 1 per ally.
 Attached ally gets +1 ATK and its attacks gain ranged.
